Name: Tile Plus Widget
Summary: A modified version of the IDE's Tile widget
Author: OpenXTalk.org, LiveCode

Name: HH SVGText Widget
Summary: Uses SVG 'fonts' (included) to allow for scalable rotated, stylized text. Great for header titles or rotating text animations
Author: Hermann Hoch

Name: HH Progress Bar
Summary: A progress display that can display as circular or as a traditional rectangular bar
Author: Hermann Hoch

Name: HH Poly Widget
Summary: A control that alows for arbitrary editing points of polygons
Author: Hermann Hoch

Name: HH Oriented Text
Summary: Oriented text is a widgetfor dispaying rotated text
Author: Hermann Hoch and Cyril Pruszko

Name: HH Icon Grid
Summary: An excellent button grid control with plenty of options, thanks to Hermann Hoch
Author: Hermann Hoch

Name: HH Digital Clock
Summary: A digital clock for displaying the current date and time
Author: Hermann Hoch

Name: HH Color Picker
Summary: A color picker control with slliders
Author: Hermann Hoch

Name: HH BaseClock
Summary: A widget that displays the current time in a bases other than base 60
Author: Hermann Hoch

Name: ApplePDFKit Widget
Summary: Widget that uses native Apple PDF Kit view
Author: Paul McClernan

Name: Openxtalk.org macOS Native Tools
Summary: Included with OXT DPE, allows for addtional macOS native behaviors from your stacks, including native darkMode support
Author: Paul McClernan

Name: CoreMIDI Library
Summary: xTalk scripting for Apple's MIDI API
Author: Paul McClernan
